scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file output.yml --s3-bucket ws-push-notifications
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yml --stack-name ws-push-notifications --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides StageName=$npm_package_config_stage_name DomainName=$npm_package_config_domain_name
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy
